fulltext:
Thu Duc district, Ho Chi Minh

DAU THE TIEN
Ruby on rails developer
I am a Ruby on rails developer, I have self-taught web development and Ruby on Rails since my junior days
and graduated Ruby on Rails courses at CoderSchool in August 2017. I work primarily in Ruby on Rails but as
well have experience in ReactJS, HTML, CSS, CoffeeScript, Twitter Bootstrap, Materialize, etc.
I am looking for a chance to gain work experience as a Ruby on Rails Developer. Willing to work hard and
excited to continue learning new skills to become a successful developer.
I want to work somewhere where I’ll have opportunities to develop my skills, take on interesting projects, and
work with people I can really learn from., I write elegant, readable code and learn new things. New
technologies are always enjoyable for me, I love to build software that solves problems and makes life easier.
Summary Summary    
Sept 2018 - Present
Jun 2017 - Jan 2018
Full-stack Web Developer (Rails / React)
Symphony Creative Solution
Utilized OOP in Ruby to implement various functionalities.
Apply ReactJS and Redux to handle the front-end part of company project
Maintain applications (Optimizing, Refactoring function)
Worked independently and worked efficiently on a team to develop a website from
scratch till the end using Rails and various common Ruby gems.
Build reusable modules to develop faster in the future.
Supported other team members.
Research solution to handle application with a larger database.
Refactor Rails application to a new pattern for clean code and optimize performance
I have gotten the best growth of the year prize since 2018
Experienced Ruby on Rails Developer
Vinova - Part-time job
Utilized OOP in Ruby to implement various functionalities.
Maintain applications (Optimizing, Refactoring function)
Worked independently and worked efficiently on a team of 8 developers to develop a website from
scratch till the end using Rails and various common Ruby gems.
Build reusable modules to develop faster in the future.
Supported my team and other team members.
Designed and implemented database architecture for applications.
Share my knowledge with my team members, coworkers and learned from them.
Work experience
Work experience    
Programming languages: Ruby, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, Slim, Haml, CoffeeScript
Frameworks / Libraries: Ruby on Rails, ReactJS, Redux, MaterializeCSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, Grape
Cloud platforms: AWS EC2, Digital Ocean, Heroku, Google Cloud
Server administration: Ubuntu server, Nginx
Storage: PostgreSQL
Tools: Sublime Text, VisualCode, Git, Docker, Terminal
Paradigms: Behavior-driven Development, Test-driven Development, Object-oriented Programming,
Responsive Web Design, Model-View-Controller
Technical Skills
Technical Skills    
ChoVoucher
A marketplace for trading, sharing voucher and coupons
Users can sell, buy vouchers or coupons. Users can purchase by COD  or Vietnam payment method. This
helps users stop wasting  unneeded voucher or coupons
Front-end: React
Backend: Rails
Designed a web-based UI with Google Material Design inspiration.
Connected payment gateway VNPay processing application to Vietnam payment method.
Develop a scraper to get more vouchers from deals page in Vietnam.
Utilized background processing to scrap data daily and to post the cheapest deal daily.
Integrated Facebook grape API to post vouchers to the Facebook page.
Using Capistrano to deploy the application to Google Cloud VPS.
Integrated Amazon S3 to serve images in the production environment.
Application config with Nginx, Puma, Let's Encrypt.
Ltrip  (Contributor)
This application is a project for the demo day of Coderschool course in August 2017
Designed a web-based UI with Google Material Design inspiration.
Integrated Amazon S3 to serve images in the production environment.
Mailing with Sengird-Email delivery service.
Integrated OmniAuth for authentication and restriction.
Using Google API to match taught places in google map.
Using API for showing the weather of place at the time.
Build Facebook Messenger bot to check trips connect with a database of the website
ASSET MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
The project to evaluate the internship course at Vinova Company
The system to manage the equipment in the company. The user can send the request and wait for
feedback from HR.
Integrated Amazon S3 to serve images in the production environment.
Mailing with Sengird-Email delivery service.
Set cronjob for an auto-updating expired request and canceled a request.
Using React and Redux to handle the front-end part.
